title: MYSERVER 12.06 IMG FILE
description:
MYSERVER 12.06 - DEBIAN 9.2

//Kernel Versions
DEBIAN GNU/Linux 4.9.0-3-686-pae
DEBIAN GNU/Linux 3.16.0-4-686-pae
DEBIAN GNU/Linux 3.2.0-4-686-pae

Updates:
- Fixed Virtualmin automatic network recognition
- BLACKLISTED IPS updated
- other upgrades
- Sda1 fix for grub boot loader
- DEFAULT ETHERNET CONNECTION

Connection scripts
->startx in terminal and u will see the scripts
-SCRIPT RUNS ON BOOT TO AUTOFILL ETH OR WIFI DEVICE NAME
-SCRIPT lan.sh JUST edit interfaces2 and interfaces3 with your ip address and execute lan.sh
-SCRIPT wifi.sh To run wifi only just exectute this script
README FILE FOR VERY very EASY INTERFACES CONFIGURATION AND WIFI connection

IF YOU WANT TO HAVE YOUR OWN SERVER THEN ||MYSERVER|| IS YOUR OS!!

THE MOST IMPORTANT IS THAT YOU DONT HAVE TO MESS WITH CODES AND PROGRAMS AND ERRORS AND WHATEVER PROBLEM A LINUX USER CAN FACE! EVERYTHING IS CONFIGURED AND INSTALLED AND WORK PERFECTLY!! EVERYTHING IS TESTED AND WORKING GREAT!

it's working either with wifi or lan. In case lan doesnt work type ifconfig in terminal and see the device name and change it in /etc/network/interfaces using startx to load the graphical view.

1)DOWNLOAD THE ISO, EXTRACT TO A USB!
2)INSTALL CLONE ZILLA TO ANOTHER USB
3)BOOT THE CLONE ZILLA USB AND CLONE USING IMAGES, SELECT THE IMAGE YOU EXTRACTED TO THE OTHER USB AND YOUR SERVER IS READY!

THE IMAGE IS CONFIGURE TO WORK WITH wifi or lan or both!

YOU CAN HOST YOUR WEBSITE,SHARE FILES AND MANY MORE!!

// MYSERVER CLUB //

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:
40GB HARD DISK
ETHERNET OR WIFI
P4 1.8ghz - 1GB RAM
LAPTOP OR DESKTOP

in terminal -> startx and connect to wifi networks! right click -> connection info and you will see the local ip! run the ip in browser and there you go! or ifconfig in terminal

There is available a 90 page guide book in the website ,which you can buy in very low price, for everything you need to know to run your server!

MYSERVER 12.XX is a LINUX DEBIAN OS that has everything a server needs and is installed and configured in the best way it can be!!

- Apache Webserver 2.4.25 -
- Postfix Mail server 3.1.6 -
- Awstats with GEOIP -
- Webalizer statistics -
- Mysql 10.1.26 -
- PHP Myadmin 4.6.6deb4
- Firewall against 15.000.000 blacklisted ips,ddos attack protection andspam. -
- PROFTPD 1.35, FTP access -
- Preconfigured modules and pagespeed(pm4 minimum)for best performance and spam protection -
- Webmin 1.860 -
- FPM/FastCGI PHP -
- PHP Version 5.6.31-6+ubuntu17.10.1+deb.sury.org+1 
- .htaccess preconfigured for best security -
- Script for dynamic ips installed to check your ip and email u if your ips changes! -
- NOIP dynDNS ip update-
- Dovecot IMAP/POP3 Server 2.2.27-
- Samba version  4.5.12-Debian-
- SSH 7.4-
- Virtualmin Version 5.05.gpl-
- SystemBack-works only with DEBIAN GNU/Linux 3.16.0-4-686-pae
- Mysql Tuner-
- Apache SERVER STATUS-
and more!!

||THE 90 PAGE GUIDE BOOK, HAS A STEP BY STEP GUIDE ON HOW TO CONFIGURE EVERYTHING A SERVER NEEDS!|| IF YOU WANT VISIT THE WEBSITE myserver/club TO BUY THE MANUAL.
